title: Shine Brightly
itunes:title: Shine Brightly
description:
Grow in your witness as you grow in your joy, love and purpose! Let your life be your message as you shine brightly each day wherever you go. Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
